website_summaries.verdict: Between its multiple colors, extra-strong iron frame, and easy-slide crank, this adjustable patio umbrella is a stylish option that will shade your pool, deck, or garden for many seasons to come.
cons: The exact color and size combination you prefer may not be readily available online

customer_reviews.title: Every single thing on my table is soaking wet very thin material like a very thin Mist comes through the umbrella fabric
customer_reviews.text: I I did a review on this once, but. it hadn't rained yet. Every single thing on my table is soaking wet very thin material like a very thin Mist comes through the umbrella fabric. That was so excited at the beginning now I'm so very disappointed Update. Cheap cheap cheap. Scratch umbrella arm broke. Sitting in picnic table close used for x. Saw the broken arm disassemble it scratches rusted, material string hanging. I'm very disappointed. I could understand if I used it all summer bad weather. But no. My last umbrella been up for 3 years nothing like this. I'm sorry I usually am call more when writing these reviews but today I'm very very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Jo jo

customer_reviews.title: good design
customer_reviews.text: Good quality,I love this color ,it's suitable for this summer,it can help us cover the sun,the handle quality is great ,it's good outdoor umbrella,we also buy a umbrella base,now it's very comfortable,it's good for us outdoor drink coffee
customer_reviews.author: connor

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella is definitely more I expected
customer_reviews.text: The price is definitely reasonable than the store.And when I got it,it is pretty good quality and easy to set up! I like it a lot .
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: STURDY! Easy to use and easy to clean. The perfect item for our patio!!
customer_reviews.author: Hankster

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY it - keep searching
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a pain. It doesn’t crank up correctly and it’s too heavy for the base which bends. At some point it will snap bc the metal is too weak for it. It’s a massive disappointment and if I could have it sent back I would. Update: The base was so flimsy it broke. I had nothing and I mean nothing but trouble from this entire thing start to finish. It’s a pile of trash that I paid a good amount of money for. DONT BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Buying on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Not Good at All
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella because it of the size and the fact it cantilevered, but after receiving it, putting it together, it simply fell right over. The base is FAR too small to even begin to hold up this umbrella, it doesn't even make sense. It would have to be permanently fastened to a deck to make it work. I was super disappointed, and honestly concerned because its a safety issue to have a 10 ft umbrella fall on someone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: so far so good, it has been a week
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, it has been a week, it does not tilt but it is a basic umbrella so that is to be expected. I love the color and it blended well with our red Chinese lanterns
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on June 16, 2018. The internal rope that holds the entire umbrella together has already frayed, making it entirely possible that the umbrella would snap and fall down. I contacted the manufacturer and they told me I could replace the rope myself, and offered me a $10.00 refund. I can see I'm not the only one who has had this problem! Don't buy this piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: W F

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.text: The design was exactly what I was looking for, looked great on-line but the umbrella came without the parts. In other words, it looks good disassembled but would look a lot better as an actual umbrella. Pinged on the company via Amazon which is where I bought the umbrella. Crickets, everyone has gone dark. Going to the hardware store tomorrow, umbrella in hand, we'll figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: J.B. Bush

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this umbrella. It is a very rich gray color. I bought the Naturefun cantilever base and this umbrella works perfectly with it. I was able to use the cross bars that came with the base, so no bars sticking out of the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June, 2018 -- used it for the season (until September), put it away for the winter. I used it for three weeks this year and the crank broke. It also faded from gray to tan within a few weeks. A good cantilever umbrella will last far longer than this -- at least 2 full seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Not so good....  So far so good. I like that it moves with the wind ...
customer_reviews.text: Update September 2020: Unfortunately the metal base is not strong enough, the umbrella tipped over one day and two of the "arms" bent about 10 degrees right at the point where it meets the vertical pole. Now the whole thing is wobbly. We have to use sandbags to keep the umbrella stable and from tipping over. (Initial post: So far so good. I like that it moves with the wind a little bit so it will not fly away.)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: It provides an excellent shade!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase!Arrived quickly and was easy to assemble and open the umbrella.It provides an excellent shade.I like this color ,give a nice pop of color against all trees and greenery behind it !
customer_reviews.author: Zengjin Li

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS JULY 12, 2018. WHERE LIVE WE ONLY HAVE 2-3 MONTHS OF WARM WEATHER WHERE WE WOULD NEED TO USE THE UMBRELLA. PUT IT UP FOR THE 4TH OF JULY CAME HOME TODAY ONLY TO FIND THE UMBRELLA IN THE DOWN POSITION BROKEN .
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Cord breaks easily!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these umbrellas and the cords in both of them broke within a couple of months. We replaced the cord, which was a pain, and it has happened again. Not worth the hassle to fix again. Will be looking to buy another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Seal

customer_reviews.title: String snapped in less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella was up less than 2 weeks and the string inside has snapped. I had one very similar to this one for almost 5 years and the string never snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Our Two Suitcases

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last one summer
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! The pole bent after a couple of DAYS! The color faded too! Will not last through the summer at all
customer_reviews.author: christine d.

customer_reviews.title: Poor overall quality.
customer_reviews.text: The cord that pulls umbrella open broke after a couple of months. Now it’s just a stand for a closed umbrella. I really expected it to last more than one season. Update: It looks like the numbers of stars has decreased since buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: ^and$

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made- plastic can't support metal
customer_reviews.text: There is a plastic piece that is supposed to support the weight of two large metal pieces and the umbrella, literally just cracked. Who would design plastic to hold metal?
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Fades
customer_reviews.text: I’m very unhappy to see that within a months time it has faded drastically. We haven’t had a chance to use it because we are waiting on the weights to come in.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I loved this umbrella when first received, however the rope that operates it broke within first month. Easeland requested photos of problem but provided no email address to send them. Have been unable to contact them again. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DLG

customer_reviews.title: The base needs to be stabilized.  Top heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used about five times. The string that adjust the umbrella broke also the whole top came apart. A rib it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Product has faded after 1 month, any wind at all blows umbrella over. As a remedy I bolted it to my deck, first swift breeze bent the metal base. Do not buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Swings too much
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is a nice and large but on a slightly windy day it would blow over even with the weighted bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Appearance is nice, but not sturdy. First high wind tipped over and broke. I also purchased a heavy duty base-did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon reader

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Selected the gray covering. Unfortunately it faded within a week of having it. Not for windy areas!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for over our grill and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marym

customer_reviews.title: Already broken
customer_reviews.text: Already broken. Had it for about 32 days. Not used daily. Wire/rope snapped
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Baird

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella concerns
customer_reviews.text: I’m very concerned with this umbrella it seems very cheaply made. The top section already is fraying the cap came apart. I’d really like a replacement ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Selma Q. Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't open any more
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine until the return window closed - two days later it was broken!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is the fabric replaceable and can I or fed a new umbrella fabric
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella works well but after being outside for ; weeks. The fabrics Is fadinng and streaking and xbhould be replaced..
customer_reviews.author: Jay Gold

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 45 days
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella lasted less than 45 days with light use (less than 10 times). Return window was 30 days. Extremely disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Marrinan

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it would be a great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it would be a great umbrella, however the bolts to mount the umbrella to the stand were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice and easy to setup patio umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: tippi

customer_reviews.title: Will tip over.  The stand does not hold umbrella upright without putting heavy object to stand on top of it.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, however fully extend will caused umbrella to fall. Require heavy object standing on top of the stand to make it stable.
customer_reviews.author: TMavC5

customer_reviews.text: The umbrella seems very nice and sturdy ! The only issue is that it was not 10' it was exactly 9'. The box said 10 foot but is was not. Called Amazon and they made it right with a small credit.
customer_reviews.author: TDC

customer_reviews.title: Fabric Faded One Week After Installation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella in the dark grey color. The color was perfect when it arrived. There was significant overall fading from the original color after one week outside. By week two the umbrella had further fading in striations all over the umbrella where the fabric received more or less sun. It now looks very old and tatty. The mechanics of the umbrella are fine for the price, but the quality of the fabric has made it a big disappointment. Is it possible to return the product as it did not perform. It is a sun umbrella after all and should be tested to perform in the sun. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Red" is not red
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent product, tilt and crank features are a plus -- polyester material is thin and lightweight, seems alright overall for the sale price I paid during Black Friday week! BUT, if you're looking for a "red" umbrella, as the description lists, look elsewhere. This "red" is burgundy, a more purple-red, definitely not the same color shown on the listing. Returning this to look for something truly red and perhaps thicker, more canvas-like.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Reber

product_meta.title: EASELAND Patio Umbrella (10ft, Beige)
product_meta.description: Patio Umbrella is the best choice for outdoors: backyard, garden, patio, beach, deck, porch, balcony and so on. You can enjoy your outdoor living and remain cool with this classic market umbrella. Our outdoor patio umbrella blocks the UV rays completely and creates a shady place for your relaxation and recreation. You can enjoy your picnic or cafe with this garden parasol. This stylish table umbrella canopy is made of 180g UV protective and Anti-fade polyester, supplying enough shade to one table with 4 to 6 chairs. The deck umbrella is constructed with quality materials, it¡¯s stable and durable even in windy days. The whole frame of this garden umbrella is powder coated for resisting rust. Air vent is designed to facilitate air flow and preventing inversion in windy climates. We sincerely advise customers do not leave the outside umbrellas open overnight or leave this backyard umbrellas up in the rain or high wind for your long-term use. Specifications: Fabric: 180g UV Protective and Fade-resistant Pole Diameter: 1.5 inch Push Button Tilt: Yes Opening Mechanism: Auto Crank Air vent: Yes Weather-resistant: Yes Style: Classic free standing Commercial/Residential: Both Type: Patio Umbrella, Outdoor Umbrella
feature_bullets: All-day Shade Enjoy: 100% polyester canopy fabric features fade resistant, water repellent, UV protection. Provide a perfect large shade for your patio, garden, deck, backyard, pool, beach life. Enjoy warm weather without getting burned.
Durable and Wind Resistant: All-iron umbrella bones and 8 heavy-duty ribs, light & sturdy. The air vents facilitate the flow of air in windy weather

Easy Operation: Elegant offset hanging design with crank and cantilever operation system for easily raise and putting down, easy-slide and lock operation system for more angles of shading, wind vent at the top to allow air flow and reduce wind pressure to enhance stability.
Convenient to Store: Wrapped with velcro strap to protect and store umbrella. keep from bad weather and prolong umbrella's life and appearance.
GUARANTEE: We choose the best material to achieve the best quality, much stronger and more durable. If there is any question, please let us know with no hesitation.
